metadata.name: Lisa Harris

persona.name: Sofia Nguyen
persona.role: Operations Lead, e-commerce warehouse (30 staff, high uptime needs)
persona.goal: Add a backup connection and confirm best-fit business internet plan; schedule a callback
persona.context: Shipping scanners and cloud systems fail during outages; experienced a recent downtime event and needs a solution quickly

intent.name: Renewal / Contract Review Callback
intent.description: An existing customer wants to renew or review their plan, which should be routed to a scheduled sales callback.
intent.goal: Confirm renewal intent, capture details, and schedule a callback appointment.
intent.initialMessage: Our contract is up soon—can someone call me to go over renewal options?

emotion.name: Curious
emotion.description: Asks exploratory questions, requests options and comparisons, uses phrases like “what are my options?” or “can you tell me more?”

metadata.outcome: Callback scheduled with Business Class agent; expectations set for backup options discussion and outage credit review.

turns.content: Our contract is up soon—can someone call me to go over renewal options? I also want to talk about adding a backup connection because our last outage really hurt our warehouse operations.
I understand you want to review renewal options and add a backup connection after the outage. Could you share your first and last name, please?

messages: I understand you want to review renewal options and add a backup connection after the outage. Could you share your first and last name, please?

turns.content: Thanks, Sofia. Just to confirm, this is for your business location, right?

messages: Thanks, Sofia. Just to confirm, this is for your business location, right?

turns.content: Yes, this is for our business location.
Great, Sofia. When would you like to schedule a call—please share a preferred date, time, and your timezone?

messages: Great, Sofia. When would you like to schedule a call—please share a preferred date, time, and your timezone?

turns.content: Soonest you have is best—ideally today or tomorrow. If possible, let’s do tomorrow at 10:00 AM in Central Time.
Great, Sofia—your call is set for January 14, 2026, 11:00 AM ET (10:00 AM CT). You'll get a text with the number to call about five minutes before. Anything else I can help with today?

messages: Great, Sofia—your call is set for January 14, 2026, 11:00 AM ET (10:00 AM CT). You'll get a text with the number to call about five minutes before. Anything else I can help with today?

turns.content:
Yes—two quick things:  

1) Will that person be able to recommend specific backup options (like LTE failover vs a second fiber line) and give ballpark pricing on that same call?  
2) Given our last outage, should I also open a separate support or billing ticket now to review any possible credit, or will the sales rep handle that too?

Our Business Class agent will cover backup options like LTE failover or a second fiber line and can give you ballpark pricing on the call. They can also open a support ticket to review any credit related to the outage if needed. Let me know if anything else comes up.

messages: Our Business Class agent will cover backup options like LTE failover or a second fiber line and can give you ballpark pricing on the call. They can also open a support ticket to review any credit related to the outage if needed. Let me know if anything else comes up.

turns.content: That’s exactly what I needed to know, thanks. I’ll wait for the text and be ready for the call tomorrow.
